nodes.text: Dissident-class light cruisers were First Order warships employed around 30 years after the Battle of Endor. New Republic Commander Poe Dameron discovered one of the light cruisers and other vessels at a staging point as the Cold War heated up.
Dissident-class light cruisers appear in the 2015 canon novel Before the Awakening, written by Greg Rucka as a prelude to Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens.
